languages.text: Шпики донесли, что сборища секты не представляют собой ничего выдающегося: разговоры с периодическими обжиганиями ладоней над открытым пламенем. За культом приглядывали до самого конца варп-полета, после чего новоявленный миссионер просто забыл о своих проповедях и избранности, а сборища прекратились.

Spies reported that the cult gatherings were hardly worth investigating — they were nothing but long conversations punctuated by people searing their palms over an open flame. The surveillance was maintained until the end of the warp journey, after which the newly born prophet simply forgot about his calling, stopped giving sermons, and dismissed his congregation.
languages.original_text: Шпики донесли, что сборища секты не представляют собой ничего выдающегося: разговоры с периодическими обжиганиями ладоней над открытым пламенем. За культом приглядывали до самого конца варп-полета, после чего новоявленный миссионер просто забыл о своих проповедях и избранности, а сборища прекратились.

traits.locale_text: The spies reported the cult gatherings were hardly worth investigating, long conversations punctuated by people searing their palms over an open flame. The surveillance was maintained until the end of the warp journey, after which the newly born prophet simply forgot about his calling, stopped giving sermons and dismissed the congregation.

Spies reported that the cult gatherings were hardly worth investigating — they were nothing but long conversations punctuated by people searing their palms over an open flame. The surveillance was maintained until the end of the warp journey, after which the newly born prophet simply forgot about his calling, stopped giving sermons, and dismissed his congregation.

languages.text: 线人报告说，这支教派的聚会几乎完全不值得费心调查，那只不过是一群人一边烤火一边长时间聊天而已。监视一直持续到亚空间航行结束，在这之后，这位先知完全忘记了他的使命，不再进行布道，解散了他的教众。
languages.original_text: Spies reported that the cult gatherings were hardly worth investigating — they were nothing but long conversations punctuated by people searing their palms over an open flame. The surveillance was maintained until the end of the warp journey, after which the newly born prophet simply forgot about his calling, stopped giving sermons, and dismissed his congregation.

traits.locale_text: 线人报告说，这支教派的聚会几乎完全不值得费心调查，那只不过是一群人一边烤火一边长时间聊天而已。监视一直持续到亚空间航行结束，在这之后，这位先知完全忘记了他的使命，不再进行布道，解散了他的教众。

languages.text: Los espías informaron de que no merecía la pena investigar las reuniones del culto, ya que no eran más que largas conversaciones interrumpidas por gente quemándose las palmas de las manos sobre una llama. La vigilancia se mantuvo hasta el final del viaje por la disformidad, tras lo cual el nuevo profeta simplemente se olvidó de su misión, dejó de dar sermones y despidió a su congregación.
languages.original_text: Spies reported that the cult gatherings were hardly worth investigating — they were nothing but long conversations punctuated by people searing their palms over an open flame. The surveillance was maintained until the end of the warp journey, after which the newly born prophet simply forgot about his calling, stopped giving sermons, and dismissed his congregation.

traits.locale_text: Los espías informaron de que no merecía la pena investigar las reuniones del culto, ya que no eran más que largas conversaciones interrumpidas por gente quemándose las palmas de las manos sobre una llama. La vigilancia se mantuvo hasta el final del viaje por la disformidad, tras lo cual el nuevo profeta simplemente se olvidó de su misión, dejó de dar sermones y despidió a su congregación.

languages.text: スパイの報告では、教団の集会はほとんど調査する価値はないという…直火で手のひらをあぶりながら、ダラダラ話しているだけなのだとか。監視は<歪み>を抜けるまで続いて、その後、新参の預言者はポンッと己の天命を忘れ去り、説教をやめて自身の集会を解散した。
languages.original_text: Spies reported that the cult gatherings were hardly worth investigating — they were nothing but long conversations punctuated by people searing their palms over an open flame. The surveillance was maintained until the end of the warp journey, after which the newly born prophet simply forgot about his calling, stopped giving sermons, and dismissed his congregation.

traits.locale_text: スパイの報告では、教団の集会はほとんど調査する価値はないという…直火で手のひらをあぶりながら、ダラダラ話しているだけなのだとか。監視は<歪み>を抜けるまで続いて、その後、新参の預言者はポンッと己の天命を忘れ去り、説教をやめて自身の集会を解散した。

languages.text: D'après les espions, les rassemblements sectaires ne présentent pas de réelle menace, ce ne sont rien de plus que de longues conversations au cours desquelles les adeptes se brûlent la main sur une flamme. La surveillance est maintenue jusqu'à la fin du passage dans le Warp, après quoi le nouveau prophète oublie simplement son apostolat, cesse les sermons et congédie sa congrégation.
languages.original_text: Spies reported that the cult gatherings were hardly worth investigating — they were nothing but long conversations punctuated by people searing their palms over an open flame. The surveillance was maintained until the end of the warp journey, after which the newly born prophet simply forgot about his calling, stopped giving sermons, and dismissed his congregation.

traits.locale_text: D'après les espions, les rassemblements sectaires ne présentent pas de réelle menace, ce ne sont rien de plus que de longues conversations au cours desquelles les adeptes se brûlent la main sur une flamme. La surveillance est maintenue jusqu'à la fin du passage dans le Warp, après quoi le nouveau prophète oublie simplement son apostolat, cesse les sermons et congédie sa congrégation.

languages.text: Spione berichten, dass es sich kaum lohnt, die Versammlungen des Kults zu überwachen: Es sind im Grunde nur lange Unterhaltungen, bei denen die Kultisten zwischendurch ihre Hand über eine offene Flamme halten. Die Überwachung wurde bis zum Ende der Warpreise aufrechterhalten. Danach vergaß der neugeborene Prophet seine Berufung wieder, hörte auf zu predigen und löste seinen Kult auf.
languages.original_text: Spies reported that the cult gatherings were hardly worth investigating — they were nothing but long conversations punctuated by people searing their palms over an open flame. The surveillance was maintained until the end of the warp journey, after which the newly born prophet simply forgot about his calling, stopped giving sermons, and dismissed his congregation.

Die Überwachung wurde bis zum Ende der Warpreise aufrechterhalten. Danach vergaß der neugeborene Prophet seine Berufung wieder, hörte auf zu predigen und löste seinen Kult auf.

languages.text: Casuslar, tarikat toplantılarının incelenmeye değmeyeceğini rapor etti. Toplantılarda sadece uzun konuşmalar yapılıyor ve insanlar, yakılan bir ateş üzerinde avuçlarını dağlıyormuş. Gözetim, öteboyut yolculuğunun sonuna kadar sürdü. Yolculuk sona erdiğinde ise bu yeni peygamber; çağrısını unuttu, vaaz vermeyi bıraktı ve cemaatini dağıttı.
languages.original_text: Spies reported that the cult gatherings were hardly worth investigating — they were nothing but long conversations punctuated by people searing their palms over an open flame. The surveillance was maintained until the end of the warp journey, after which the newly born prophet simply forgot about his calling, stopped giving sermons, and dismissed his congregation.
